C

com.dhchoi - package com.dhchoi
 
configure(long, long) - Method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Configures the tick interval and timer duration in milliseconds.
CountdownTimer - Class in com.dhchoi
 

D

dispose() - Method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Method used by the main Processing applet to clear up any resources used by the timer when closing the applet.

G

getCountdownTimerForId(int) - Static method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Returns the timer associated with the corresponding id.
getId() - Method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Returns the id of the timer.
getNewCountdownTimer(PApplet) - Static method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Returns a new timer that can be used inside the main Processing applet.

I

isPaused() - Method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Returns true if the timer was stopped before being finished.
isRunning() - Method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Returns true if the timer is currently running.

R

reset() - Method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Stops the timer and resets it to the most recent configuration.

S

start() - Method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Starts the timer with the most recent tick interval and timer duration configuration.
stop() - Method in class com.dhchoi.CountdownTimer
Interrupts the timer to stop after the currently running interval has been completed.
